wikipedia_page.main: Patrick G. Hart (born 5 August 1965) is a TV host, radio broadcaster and recording artist based in Bristol, England. He is the director and station manager of Bristol-based BCFM radio and a broadcaster on BBC Radio, BCFM and Made Television. Hart currently hosts The One Love Breakfast show on BCFM  and co-hosts The Carib-Asian Cookery Show with wife Sherrie Eugene, on Made in Bristol. He is also a recording artist with the band Freshblood Crew and the founder of Bristol Athletic Football Club.
